attributes.action: Let’s Exit from the EU on WTO Terms and Get the 2nd Referendum on the 8th Year.
attributes.background: I believe the referendum result should be implemented as well as the voice of the remain voter should be heard. It is against democracy to arrange 2nd referendum before implementing 1st. Therefore, I am proposing a Brexit on WTO and to hear the remain voice arrange 2nd referendum in 8 years.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament would be responsible for. It would be for a future Government or Parliament to arrange a referendum in eight years time as under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act there would have to be at least one general election between now and then.
